settings.heading: Thousands of Happier, Healthier Patients
settings.description:
Floré is more than just a probiotic. With a personalized approach in gut health testing + personalized probiotic formulation, Floré allows your patients to experience true change from the inside out.
Join our growing community of healthcare providers! Floré Clinical Affiliates come from a variety of practice backgrounds and disciplines. While everyone is on a unique journey, we all share a common passion to help others with their overall well-being.

settings.mission_points: Ongoing patient support to allow practice to be as involved as you choose.
Flore customer service for all things related to product.
Online portal for ease of patient tracking, reporting & follow up

settings.heading: 1. Review
settings.content:
MONTH 1 | Analyze the gut

  • At-home stool collection kit
  • Uncover over 23,000 different bacteria
  • Quantification
settings.content-two:
MONTH 1 | Prepare the gut

Floré Bloom Vitamin & Mineral Supplement
  • Anti-inflammatory
  • Anti-Oxidant
  • Anti-Pathogen

settings.heading: 2. Reduce
settings.content:
MONTHS 2-6

Floré Custom Probiotics
  • Beneficial microbes
  • Community building
  • Based on microbiome

settings.heading: 3. Replenish
settings.content:
MONTHS 3-6

Floré Boost Prebiotics
  • Increase strict anaerobes like Akkermansia
  • Feed beneficial microbes including your custom
  • Enable cross-feeding to grow a community

settings.heading: 4. Reinforce
settings.content:
MONTH 4

Retest
  • Review your ever-evolving microbiome with a follow up analysis
  • Track longitudinal trends and changes in your gut microflora

settings.heading: How it Works
settings.description: The Floré Clinical Microbiome, is a four step Program of 1. Review 2. Reduce 3. Replenish and 4. Reinforce that provides state-of-the-art gut wellness uniquely tailored to each patient.

settings.heading: Ready to Get Started?
settings.button_text: Connect with us to learn more
